  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    @Description(value="Decode a OAI-PMH file containing a Qucosa record.")
@In(value=java.io.Reader.class)
@Out(value=org.culturegraph.mf.framework.StreamReceiver.class)
public final class QucosaDecoder
extends org.culturegraph.mf.framework.DefaultObjectPipe<java.io.Reader,org.culturegraph.mf.framework.StreamReceiver>
    Decode a OAI-PMH file containing a Qucosa record.
    Author:
    Paul Horn

      • process

        public void process(org.xml.sax.InputSource in)
        Process the Qucosa file. Parse the XML and for evert occurrence of recordPrefix, send a new record downstream.
        Parameters:
        in - The InputSource for the XML file.

      • process

        Process a Qucosa file provide as String (where the string denotes the actual file content, not the filename.)
        Parameters:
        content - The textual content of the Qucosa file
